reviews.name: Micaela Byron
reviews.text:
If, like me, you've been seriously procrastinating on a trip to the dentist, fear not! Book yourself in with Alex and the folks at Kedron Family Dental.

Dr Alex is kind, thorough and adopts a holistic approach to his dentistry. For example, he took the time to check my neck, jaw and lymph nodes, which surprised me as no dentist has ever done that before.

Alex also asked thoughtful questions about my diet and carefully explained the effect of acidic drinks on the entire digestive process, not just my now oh-so-sensitive chompers. He also accommodated a long overdue filling without removing an organ to pay for it.

Do I regret all the water with lemon juice (#health) that I've been guzzling recently? Yes.

Do I regret my trip to KFD? No. Quite an enjoyable morning all round.

Book yourself in!

answers.answer: Although determining if treatment is necessary can be difficult, the following signs may help in prompting you to seek orthodontic advice: crowded or overlapping teeth, gaps between the teeth, front top teeth not lining up with the bottom teeth, top front teeth not meeting with the bottom teeth and top front teeth covering more than 50% of the bottom teeth can signal the need to investigate.  If you see any misalignment of shifting of the jaw, your child may have a skeletal problem, which may require early orthodontic treatment.  These are only some of the obvious symptoms of orthodontic problems.

reviews.name: Michelle Pullinger
reviews.text:
I wanted to share my wonderful experience with Nundah Village Dental. I have a huge phobia of going to the dentist. I am not one to not go, I face it every 6-12 months, but it's a terrible anxiety I have and I struggle to go. I think it's mainly due to some horrendous experiences in the past particularly when I was a child and some awful dentists. Anyway, I have now seen Dr Nermin on 3 separate occasions. From the moment you get in the front door you are greeted by lovely and friendly receptionists, the dental assistants are so welcoming, and the minute I go into the room I'm greeted with a big smile from Dr Nermin, and a friendly chat and she immediately makes me feel at ease. I explained in my first appointment with her about my phobia and she has been nothing but understanding. She communicates and consults with you every step of the way, she tells you exactly what she's doing, gives me a break when I need, takes things slowly if I start getting anxious, allows you to ask questions, shows you everything in your images and explains it to you thoroughly in a way you can understand.

I suffer from vertigo and I recently needed a big filling right at the back of my mouth, so I had to be on a weird angle for the filling to be done. Dr Nermin and her dental assistant Vivienne constantly checked in on me, ensured I had a pillow so I wouldn't feel dizzy, and played the music really loud so I wouldn't be bothered by all the drilling - it was almost like a party :) They were so kind and considerate and I felt totally at ease.

I had to go back a couple of days later as I just needed a part of my tooth a bit more smooth after all the numbness had worn off and before I even laid down Vivienne had the pillow out remembering that I had Vertigo. Whether it was written down in the notes or not, that made me feel like a valued and cared for customer.

While I do find this clinic more expensive than others, and I don't get as much back on my private health as I would at a preferred provider, I will continue to spend the extra money and go to this practice given the wonderful treatment I receive and how at ease they make me feel. Thank you so much for showing me there can be great dentists out there who won't make it a traumatic experience.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much Michelle. We always try to go above and beyond for our parents and are thrilled we were able to make your visits comfortable and relaxed. The team all appreciated the time you took for this review.

reviews.text: Hands down the most amazing Dental practice I have ever been to. 10/10. The staff are so welcoming and friendly. My dentist made sure I was comfortable throughout all my procedures and made me aware of everything she was doing. The receptionist even walked me out and opened the door for me. Blown away by the customer service here and will never go anywhere else!

reviews.name: Brad Gunn
reviews.text:
I have been a loyal patient of Brisbane Dental for over 20 years, and throughout that time, the level of service and care I‚Äôve received has been consistently exceptional. In the past, I would often delay or avoid dental visits due to discomfort and uncertainty. However, Brisbane Dental has completely changed my perspective.

What sets them apart is the genuine care and attention they provide. The team took the time to clearly explain the importance of my personalised dental care plan, helping me understand how each step contributes to my long-term oral health. This clarity and reassurance have made a significant difference‚Äînot only do I no longer avoid dental appointments, I now actively make the effort to attend.

From the moment I walk in and am greeted at reception, right through to the treatment itself, every interaction is marked by professionalism, warmth, and a commitment to excellence. The entire experience is seamless and reassuring.

I would not hesitate for a moment to recommend Brisbane Dental to anyone seeking high-quality dental care backed by years of trusted service.

Excellent experience from caring highly skilled dentists.

Today was my second visit to see Dr James and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the experience.

From the moment you open the door, the team make you feel relaxed and calm, they are warm and kind which is the standout.

Dr James was gentle and knowledgeable and explained the process from start to finish and he made the process of getting a filling be that was, dare I say it, enjoyable.

reviews.name: MrBenclayton
reviews.text:
We took our 7 year old daughter to see Dr. James at Aesthetic Smile Collective last week and had the best experience ever.  Our daughter is very adventurous but when it comes to teeth is nervous and gets very upset.

Dr. James was amazing. He was calm and caring with her but firm which is what she needed. He explained everything and answered all her questions. He built trust with her by doing what he said he was going to do and by the end she had a needle and a filling that she said didn‚Äôt hurt at all. Dr. James had some pretty amazing techniques to perform the work without her feeling any pain. She had a smile on her face by the end and Dr. James was her hero. She is so much more confident with her teeth now and it really is all because of this great experience at Aesthetic Smile Collective. All the staff were so friendly and professional and I highly recommend Aesthetic Smile Collective.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hi Ben. We are thrilled that your daughter had such a good experience with us. She was a pleasure to treat and it really makes our day when we can get kids to have a positive experience. We thank your for putting your trust in us and we look forward to welcoming you both again soon.
